showerReviews.reviewText: The playground here is Visit. As a parent of a child with autism, this playground has a few sensory details, built in and is plenty big enough, and safe enough, for all of our children. They especially loved the zip line and the dollhouse elements. My only complaint is that there’s not a bathroom closer by.

Great family park that is all inclusive. Very modern playground equipment, picnic area, and extremely clean restroom facilities. Glad we found this park, which is somewhat tucked away off of Central Avenue.
Very nice playground for kids. Modern design, perfect condition. The restroom next to it. If planning to come early in the morning or after rain take a towel to remove dew from surface.

showerReviews.reviewText:
Excellent food. I attended a baby shower here recently on which had brunch. Fruits, breakfast bar and hot cocoa bar were well presented
Bathrooms are cleany too which is a bonus when you bring kids.
